thread.section_title: Hotel Duquesne Eiffel - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Paris, France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Perfectly located cozy hotel
thread.title_full: Perfectly located cozy hotel - Review of Hotel Duquesne Eiffel, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: Russell B
title: Perfectly located cozy hotel
text:
We had a great stay at Hotel Duquesne Eiffel. The staff was friendly and you can't beat the location. There are small bakeries and cafes all over the place and we even ran into the farmers market on Saturday morning.
The rooms are fairly small but most in Paris are. The room was exceptionally clean and the bed was SUPER soft. I would definitely stay here again.
